snippet: The instructor at Riverdale Country School, Richard Hovan, was fired in 2011 after allegations surfaced that he had oral sex with a student.
abstract: Richard Hovan, former math teacher at Riverdale Country School in the Bronx, is arrested on charges of engaging in sexual contact with a student; Hovan was fired by the school in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The instructor at Riverdale Country School, Richard Hovan, was fired in 2011 after allegations surfaced that he had oral sex with a student.
